channel.title: 562 other player say what i want

item.title: 562 other player say what i want
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Hi, ive tryied some 562 source and all the source got something like this :

if(cmd[0].equals("join")) { for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if (pl != null) { pl.animate(2414); pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true); pl.forceChat("Join FinalCreed 562 Today!"); } } }

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“runeheat”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>RuneHeat [562] Is The fucking best!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

or

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“xap”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>xap Fucking Owns… You Mother Fuckers! He Coded Your Ass!<img=1>");
}
}

				}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“lol”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>roflmaolallalla<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“guthix”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2108);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>guuuuthiiiiix!!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“joinnow”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>So Join Us In This Amazing Server Today!!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“dance”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(2414);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>dance!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

[code] if(cmd[0].equals(“jackoff”)) {
for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (pl != null) {
pl.animate(3636);
pl.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true);
pl.forceChat("<img=1>Lets all jackoff! WEWT!!!<img=1>");
}
}

}[/code]

but how do i change it to make other people what i want? like i write say lol in the console, all other players say lol…?

Read full topic
